title: Etherian Javelin Thrower
summaries: The Etherian Javelin Thrower is an enemy that spawns during the Old One's Army event. It attacks by throwing [img:Javelin 2] javelins at its target from a distance that will pierce through the player.
Acquiring its <linked>banner</linked> requires 200 kills, as opposed to the usual 50.

statistics.Banner: [img:Etherian Javelin Thrower Banner]Etherian Javelin Thrower Banner(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
